mapper.insert: insert into trace_flow (trace_id,farmer_id, purchase_id, test_id,sampling_id, transport_id,sale_id,trace_status,qrcode,createtime) values (#{trace_id},#{farmer_id},#{purchase_id},#{test_id},#{sampling_id}, #{transport_id},#{sale_id},#{trace_status},#{qrcode},#{createtime})
mapper.select: SELECT * from trace_flow tf,farmer f,purchase p,test t,transport tra,qrcode q WHERE f.farmer_id = tf.farmer_id and p.purchase_id = tf.purchase_id and t.test_id = tf.test_id and tra.transport_id = tf.transport_id and q.qrcode_id = tf.qrcode and tf.trace_id = #{trace_id} and tf.trace_status = '6'
